Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students connected by a string telephone.
The student can include a description or labels showing how the string telephone works with sound.
The student can depict the device as sending or receiving information over a distance.
The student can include a drawing of the materials used to create the string telephone, emphasizing light or sound as the communication method.
The student can illustrate how this device helps solve the problem of communicating over long distances.
